summary.span: 定义一个数据服务接口，控件设计人员可以通过该接口将数据存储区或与数据库相关的功能集成到设计环境中。

span.span: Defines an interface to data services that enables control designers to integrate data store or database-related functionality into their design environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口的对象 可以在设计时访问可用于应用程序的数据连接。An object that implements the interface can access the data connections available to an application at design time. 接口提供了列出可用数据连接、创建新的数据连接、从连接中检索架构信息以及将数据连接配置信息保存到应用程序配置文件的方法。The interface provides methods to list available data connections, create new data connections, retrieve schema information from a connection, and save data-connection configuration information to the application's configuration file. 接口使您能够与设计环境中的数据连接进行交互，但它并不是一个数据管理 API。The interface enables you to interact with data connections in the design environment, but it is not intended as a data-management API.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可激活设计环境的用户界面，用于创建或编辑数据连接。Use the method to activate the design environment's user interface for creating or editing data connections. 如果 `initialConnection` 参数为 `null` ，则指示用户要创建新连接。If the `initialConnection` parameter is `null`, it indicates the user wants to create a new connection. 如果 `initialConnection` 参数是一个 对象，则它指示用户要编辑现有连接。If the `initialConnection` parameter is a object, it indicates the user wants to edit an existing connection. 设计环境负责创建数据连接、将连接添加到全局连接列表或 Web 应用程序的配置文件，以及将新连接添加到 属性。Your design environment is responsible for creating the data connection, adding the connection either to a global list of connections or to the Web application's configuration file, and adding the new connection to the property. 新连接应包含应用程序在运行时创建数据连接所需的信息。The new connection should include the information that the application needs to create a data connection at run time. 如果需要在设计环境中使用数据连接，请使用 方法返回 将从设计环境连接到数据存储的对象。If you need to use the data connection in the design environment, use the method to return a object that will connect to the data store from the design environment. 如果用户选择取消新的连接创建过程，则该 方法应返回 `null` 。If the user chooses to cancel the new connection creation process, the method should return `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将连接写入应用程序的配置文件。The method writes a connection to the application's configuration file. 连接字符串和提供程序名称将写入 [ (ASP.NET 设置架构中的 ConnectionStrings 元素，) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bf7sd233(v=vs.100)) 配置元素根据参数进行命名 `name` 。The connection string and provider name are written to the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bf7sd233(v=vs.100)) configuration element named according to the `name` parameter. 忽略参数的属性 `connection` 。The property of the `connection` parameter is ignored. 方法的实现 应引发以下异常。Implementations of the method should throw the following exceptions. |异常Exception|原因Reason| |---------------|------------| ||应用程序的配置文件中存在重复的名称。A duplicate name exists in the application's configuration file.| |、 或其他相应的文件 IO 异常。, , or other appropriate file IO exception.|无法更新应用程序的配置文件。The application's configuration file cannot be updated. 方法实现应引发相应的异常。Your method implementation should throw an appropriate exception.| ||无法从源代码管理系统中签出应用程序的配置文件。The application's configuration file cannot be checked out from the source control system.| 请考虑使用命名空间中的配置管理 Api 来读取和写入应用程序的配置文件。Consider using the configuration-management APIs in the namespace to read and write the application's configuration file. 类将读取和写入[connectionStrings 元素 (ASP.NET Settings 架构) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bf7sd233(v=vs.100))配置元素。The class will read and write the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bf7sd233(v=vs.100)) configuration element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回在设计时可用的一组连接。The property returns the set of connections available at design time. 您的属性实现 可以返回在当前 Web 应用程序中定义的连接列表，或返回在全局级别定义的连接列表，如设计环境所维护的数据连接的列表。Your implementation of the property can return either the list of connections defined in the current Web application, or a list of connections defined at a global level, such as a list of data connections maintained by the design environment. 集合中的每个连接都应具有唯一的连接字符串。Each connection in the collection should have a unique connection string. 如果集合同时包含应用程序配置文件和全局连接的连接，则实现必须处理来自全局列表和配置文件的连接具有相同连接字符串的情况。If your collection includes both connections from the application's configuration file and global connections, your implementation must handle the case where connections from the global list and the configuration file have the same connection string. 在这种情况下，建议消除重复项并仅使用配置文件连接。In this case, it is recommended that you eliminate duplicates and use the configuration-file connection only.
